primary_symptoms: pain in the right side of your abdomen (tummy)
pain that gets worse when you move, cough or press on the area
pain that feels slightly better when you pull your knees up to your chest
secondary_symptoms: feeling or being sick, or loss of appetite

primary_symptoms: wheezing
shortness of breath
your chest feeling tight
an itchy, spotty rash that can be anywhere on the body
spots that can be anywhere on the body, including inside the mouth and around the genitals
secondary_symptoms: aches and pains, and generally feel unwell

primary_symptoms: you have not had a poo at least 3 times during the last week
the poo is unusually large or small and is dry, hard or lumpy
you are straining or in pain when you have a poo
secondary_symptoms: you feel like you haven't fully emptied your bowels

primary_symptoms: a high temperature or shivering (chills)
a new, continuous cough
a loss or change to your sense of smell or taste
pain inside the ear (earache)
a feeling of pressure or fullness inside the ear
secondary_symptoms: discharge running out of the ear
itching and irritation in and around the ear
scaly skin in and around the ear

primary_symptoms: a sudden high temperature
an aching body
feeling tired or exhausted
feeling sick or being sick
diarrhoea
tummy pain
sneezing and coughing
a runny or blocked nose
itchy, red or watery eyes
secondary_symptoms: itchy throat, mouth, nose and ears
pain around the sides of your head and your forehead

primary_symptoms: find it hard to go to sleep
wake up several times during the night
lie awake at night
secondary_symptoms: wake up early and cannot go back to sleep
still feel tired after waking up
find it hard to nap during the day even though you're tired
feel tired and irritable during the day
find it difficult to concentrate during the day because you're tired

primary_symptoms: a very bad headache with a throbbing pain on 1 side of the head
problems with your sight, such as seeing zigzag lines or flashing lights
secondary_symptoms: feeling very tired and yawning a lot
craving certain foods or feeling thirsty
numbness or a tingling that feels like pins and needles

primary_symptoms: feeling very thirsty all the time
peeing more than usual
feeling very tired
secondary_symptoms: cuts or wounds taking longer to heal
itching around your penis or vagina, or you keep getting thrush

primary_symptoms: a sore throat
problems swallowing
swollen, painful glands in your neck (feels like a lump on the side of your neck)
secondary_symptoms: pus-filled spots or white patches on your tonsils

primary_symptoms: itchy skin or a raised rash (hives)
swelling of the lips, face and eyes (angioedema)
secondary_symptoms: coughing, wheezing, breathlessness, noisy breathing or a hoarse voice
sneezing or an itchy, runny or blocked nose

an unpleasant sour taste in your mouth, caused by stomach acid
